title: Why The Bicycle With Two Chains Might Just Be The Best Bike Here: Eurobike 2024
content:
World Bicycle Relief took over three years to make this new Buffalo S2, but its simple two-speed drivetrain feels worth the wait.

Read the full article at Why The Bicycle With Two Chains Might Just Be The Best Bike Here: Eurobike 2024 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
